data.client_settings: [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: canary, Build Number: 22066, Version Hash: 550d50f4296613eb902516ed68fc9d491273bd59
data.actual_result: When scrolling on either guilds, channels, or member list, current gif emojis in the text channel will freeze until you stop. When scrolling on the text channel, gif emojis will reset and will start playing again when you stop scrolling.
data.expected_result: Gif emoji(s) continue playing smoothly with no buffer, pause, or skip
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a gif emoji loaded and working in text channel - Use scroll wheel on either guilds, channels, or member list - OR, use scroll wheel on text channel
